title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr. Alexander Carlyle, Minister of Inveresk,
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: Home and I stopped at Polwarth manse for a night, and Eobertson and Adam went on by Longformacus to Gladsmuir, Robertson's abode.

title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr Alexander Carlyle ;
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: Home and I stopped at Polwarth manse for a night, and Robertson and Adam went on by Longformacus to Gladsmuir, Robertson's abode.

title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr Alexander Carlyle ;
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: * Lindsay was minister of the parish of Kirkliston, and Monteath of the parish of Longformacus.
